answers.answer: Test again if it changed maybe you should go in?
I would wait. It's best if you're being as still as possible. It also helps to lay on your left side when you take it.
First calm down before u retest because ur nerves can add to ur pressure going up

question: Im 27 weeks pregnant I have always had high blood pressure only in the 140s im feeling shaking and nauseous checked my blood pressure again and its 159 over 92 should I go to the emergency or wait and see if it goes down ??? I dont want it to be preeclampsia !! :(
title: helpp
